Cleveland King: Tha Crowning, mostly referred to as Cleveland King 1 is the first studio album by American rapper turned producer Pyromaniac. It was released on October 31, 2025, by MADE Music. The album's features include rappers Bryzaa, Max, Wildstar, male fantasy, and 17j.
